executable.title: Clip Anisotropy
executable.description: This program will zero the first and/or last slice of an anisotropy image, creating a clipped anisotropy image.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.description: Parameters for clipping an anisotropy image

image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing the clipped anisotropy image
image.label: Output Image Volume

boolean.name: clipFirstSlice
boolean.description: Clip the first slice of the anisotropy image
boolean.label: Clip First Slice

boolean.name: clipLastSlice
boolean.description: Clip the last slice of the anisotropy image
boolean.label: Clip Last Slice
